help.short: The name of targeted Nginx deployment

commands.name: delete

help.short: The name of targeted NGINX deployment

commands.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the targeted NGINX deployment
lines: It should contain only alphanumeric characters, up to 30 characters long; and cannot begin or end with a hyphen.

help.short: Managed identity to perform operations on Azure key vault or storage account
lines: The managed identity should have necessary access roles on the Azure resources. For certificate access, the managed identity should have cert read access on Azure key vault. For storage account logging, it should have blob contributor role.
Type is an enum that accepts values UserAssigned or SystemAssigned

help.short: Set the system managed identity.
Type of managed identity to use
Set the user managed identities.
The billing information for the resource
Name of the SKU.
Tags for deployment.
Autoupgrade settings of a deployment. can be stable or preview
Channel used for autoupgrade.
Boolean to enable/disable diagnostics support
To have logs sent to your storage account. Must specify managed identity with blob contributor role on Azure storage account
IP address and VNet + subnet information
lines: Usage: --network-profile front-end-ip-configuration="<private or public IP address information>" network-interface-configuration="<subnet information>"
front-end-ip-configuration: IP information, public or private IP addresses.
network-interface-configuration: A subnet within your virtual network. This subnet should be delegated to NGINX.NGINXPLUS/nginxDeployments

help.short: Settings for NGINX App Protect (NAP)
Settings for the NGINX App Protect Web Application Firewall (WAF)
The activation state of the WAF. Use 'Enabled' to enable the WAF and 'Disabled' to disable it.
Scaling for NGINX capacity units (NCUs)
The capacity parameters of the profile.
The maximum number of NCUs the deployment can be autoscaled to.
The minimum number of NCUs the deployment can be autoscaled to.
Optional: Preferred communication email
The preferred support contact email address of the user used for sending alerts and notification. Can be an empty string or a valid email address.

lines: The managed identity should have necessary access roles on the Azure resources. For certificate access, the managed identity should have cert read access on Azure key vault. For storage account logging, it should have blob contributor role.
Type is an enum that accepts values UserAssigned or SystemAssigned
